Enjoy countless game scenarios with your friends in this 4-15 player party-game, talk your way out of trouble with in-game voice chat, and immerse yourself in an ever-changing world with surprises around every corner!

name: Starfield: Rev-8
description:
This update added the REV-8 land vehicle, available after installing a vehicle module. It is an armored vehicle with a mounted turret and boosters that will be automatically deployed outside your ship wherever you land.

Along with the general fixes and improvements for the game, this update also included new Xbox Series S display settings to mirror the existing Xbox Series X settings with frame rate targets, Visual or Performance priority options and a VSync toggle.

With deadly challenges you'll recognize from "Squid Game," the series, and more new games inspired by classic childhood activities, each round is a dark trip down memory lane. Can you make it through playtime alive?

description:

The game takes place in a fictional world Nevendaar. At the beginning of the game the player chooses a class of a ruler: Alderman, Warlord or Archmage. Each ruler has his bonuses, defining the style of the game. “Disciples” game process includes two components: a capital improvement that gives access to new troops and abilities, as well as the study of magic spells, used on the strategic map; and use the heroes in the lead of small detachments to conduct reconnaissance, making attacks and seizure of lands and resources.

name: Befriended Curse
description: Witches, curses, and fairy tales meet horror in this classic walking sim with an eerie atmosphere and well-paced jumpscares.

name: Tiny Chao Garden
description:
The Tiny Chao Garden (チャオのプチガーデン or Chao no Petit Garden) is a mini game available in Sonic Advance, Sonic Advance 2, Sonic Pinball Party, and downloadable to a Game Boy Advance via Sonic Adventure 2: Battle, Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut, and Phantasy Star Online Episode I & II (GameCube version). The 2 Games in 1: Sonic Advance & Sonic Pinball Party compilation contains a separate Tiny Chao Garden for each game.

Like the Chao Adventure mini-game on consoles, Tiny Chao Garden allows the player to take their Chao with them and raise it on their Game Boy Advance. The Chao does not age like it does in Sonic Adventure, so the player has plenty of time to raise all of its stats to level 99.

name: Onsei Kanjou Sokuteiki: Kokoro Scan
description: While all games from Sega's Naruhodo edutainment series did not garner much mention, this game did. This is due to its bizzare premise and unique use of the Nintendo DS microphone picking up nuances in emotions of the voice. This technology was developed by SGI Japan.

name: Bloons Card Storm
description: A turn-based collectible card game set in the Bloons universe.

name: Nuts
description: Nuts is a single-level PWAD for Doom II meant for limit removing source ports. It was designed by Bernard De Windt (B.P.R.D) and uses as its music track a MIDI sequence of "Kashmir" by Led Zeppelin. Nuts is a massive slaughter map featuring a deliberately outrageous number of enemies, known for slowing down even the most powerful of computers to a crawl upon release. It was created to test the /idgames archive upload function for the author's contemporary work, Equinox, and is now remembered as a quintessential joke WAD. Two years later, it received two sequels, Nuts 2 and Nuts 3.

name: DanceDanceRevolution Kids
description: In December 2000, Konami released Dance Dance Revolution KIDS, which had a new cabinet and game specifically made for a younger audience. The game was never released outside of Japan. Today, very few of these cabinets are left.

name: Dance Maniax 2ndMIX append JPARADISE
description: This was the first and only append game in the Dance Maniax series, and the last game in the series altogether.

name: ParaParaParadise V1.1
description:
Update of the original ParaParaParadise, which was released a month prior.
The ENJOY mode was removed.
The NORMAL, HARD and EXPERT difficulties were placed in a new folder, labeled FREESTYLE.
Total songs: 28

name: Gravelord
description: Gravelord is a fast-paced boomer shooter voiced by a badass protagonist featuring hand-crafted levels filled with secrets and hordes of enemies to kill. Dish out some brutal carnage with powerful guns and collect Tarot Cards to gain even more killing power. Let's put the fun back in funeral!

name: Pop'n Music: Mickey Tunes
description: pop'n music MICKEY TUNES is a pop'n music spin-off containing exclusively Disney related music, much like DanceDanceRevolution and its spin-offs. It was later directly ported to consoles as pop'n music Disney Tunes

name: Toy'sMarch
description:
Toy's March is a easier version of Konami's Drummania. It only has one drum pad and one symbal pad, but can be played by 2 people at once.

Player's get to choose from over 25 songs, which features many themes from teenage anime, as well as popular J-Pop "anthems" by popular artists. Each tune is rated in difficulty from 1 to 5 stars. When the music starts players must match the coloured symbols on the correct pad. Blue note equal drum, Yellow equals cymbal and Blue line equals rapid drum beating.

After the music stops, a result screen displayed the correct notes each player made and the winner is announced.

name: Dance 86.4 Funky Radio Station
description:
DANCE 86.4 FUNKY RADIO STATION is part of the BEMANI line of arcade music video games. Like the DanceDanceRevolution series, it's a dance simulation game, although it's aimed at younger players. The title is read as "DANCE Yaroyo", which means "Let's DANCE".

DANCE 86.4 has only three foot panels, which are lined up horizontally, and it supports up to two players.

name: Toy'sMarch2
description:
The 2nd version of Konami's Toy's March. Which is a simplified version of Konami's other Drum simulator Drummania. This version features new songs, characters, backgrounds and layouts.

The game flow is similar to other Konami's music games. Player's get to choose a song rated in difficulty from 1 to 5 stars. The playfield consists colourful backgrounds with cute animated characters dancing around.

On each side of the screen is the player's section. Images fall from the top of the screen and when the image reaches the marker at the bottom. The player must strike the correct pad either the drum or the cymbal.

There are 3 main images, a blue note meaning strike the drum. A Yellow cymbal meaning strike the cymbal. Or a blue block meaning strike the drum rapidly. This block can be any length, the player must keep striking the drum for as long as the block lasts.

When the music ends, the players ratings & successful strikes are revealed and in versus mode a winner is declared.

name: Payday 3: Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue
description:
What would you do if some corrupt cops raided your completely legitimate business, planted some evidence, and showed every sign of wanting to keep the gold they “confiscated”? Well, in Vlad’s case, he got in touch with his old friends in the Payday Gang to enact revenge and get his damn gold back.
The Boys in Blue Heist tasks the gang with breaking into a secure holding facility of the NYPD on Vlad’s behalf. He wants his gold back, and the gang has never let him down before.

name: GuitarFreaks 10thMix & DrumMania 9thMix
description:
GuitarFreaks 10th Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. The machine can be played by one or two players, and can also be linked with DrumMania 9th Mix. This version features 30 new hit songs with difficult moves.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 2ndMix
description:
GuitarFreaks 2nd Mix is the second game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. This version includes 40 songs, many of which are new songs.

Gameplay remains the same from the previous version, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 3rdMix
description:
GuitarFreaks 3rd Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. New to this version is the "Bound Track Mode", which covers the systems of EXTRA/ENCORE stages.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: GuitarFreaks 11thMix & DrumMania 10thMix
description:
GuitarFreaks 11th Mix is a game in the popular GuitarFreaks series of music video games from Konami. The machine can be played by one or two players, and can also be linked with DrumMania 10th Mix. This version adds more than 30 brand new songs, for a total of over 110 songs.

Gameplay remains the same from previous titles, with the player using a simulated guitar controller to play the notes of a chosen songs guitar part as they are displayed on the screen.

name: Pop'n Stage EX
description: pop'n stage ex is an upgraded version of pop'n stage, which includes two new songs, several pop'n music 3 songs, and a brand-new MANIAC difficulty. MANIAC is available for both 6 and 10 Switches mode. However, unlike the other difficulties, 10-Switches MANIAC charts are intended for one player instead of two. In MANIAC, most characters' palettes are changed to their 3P colors. The few exceptions are White day dream and full moon, which switch their characters' palettes to their 4P colors, and A LOVE WE NEVER KNEW which changes its character to Nyami [pns-3P]. BEGINNER and NORMAL MODEs were renamed to NORMAL and ANOTHER MODEs.

name: Eldritch Empathy
description: Learn the language of a cosmic colossus in the Lovecraftian rogue-lite Eldritch Empathy. Study eerie horrors to learn their secrets, or destroy them and face the consequences. Your choices determine the fate of humanity.

name: Train Sim World VR: New York
description: Get ready for Train Sim World VR: New York! Grab the controls of modern trains and explore the MTA Harlem Line between Grand Central Terminal and North White Plains.

name: Orange: The Annoying Clicker
description: Orange is a spiritual successor to certain phallic fruit clicker Game, in which you click an Orange, only a little bit more annoying *wink*! All you have to do is click the Orange! No Drama No Stress

name: Monsters
description: Monster is a clicker game and you click a monster. After a few clicks you will get more monsters. The epic monsters are waiting for you. Do you want to catch them?

name: MindFall
description: This is a game about Rubik's cube! Here you have to control the cube and get to the end, but everything is not so simple. If the cube turns over on one of the sides, its control will change, and it will not be so easy to pass!

name: The Hamster
description: Welcome to "The Hamster" – a fun and relaxing clicker game where you collect unique skins for your adorable hamster. Earn points, unlock new skins, and enjoy the simple yet captivating gameplay. Perfect for those looking for a light and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: Crazy Corn
description: Crazy Corn is an addictive clicker game where your clicking skills can lead you to unimaginable riches! Improve your level, automate your income and unlock new items.

name: Tiny Dino: Royale
description: Can you avoid extinction in Tiny Dino: Royale? A new genre bending clicker game where you compete with players to see who can survive the longest. Collect unique dino skins that can be used to craft rare rewards, climb the leaderboards, and find out how many ways you can destroy asteroids.

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is a clicker game where you click on a watermelon to earn more watermelons! In Watermelon, your goal is to click the juicy fruit to expand your watermelon collection. Every 3 hours, a new watermelon will appear for you to add to your growing stash.

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is a clicker Game, in which you click a watermelon!

name: Bertha Butt's Boogie
description: Made for the June 2013 Monthly AGS competition. Bertha wants to win a dance contest, and needs her family's help to win.

name: Have Your Monster
description: An experimental interactive poem about toxic lesbians ripping each other apart, under 800 words with 2 outcomes

name: Chronicon: Survivors
description: Fight a mix of familiar and new dangerous foes in this fast paced horde survival game! Upgrade your weapons, unlock new items & characters, advance in the permanent passive skill tree, and try to survive the horde! Based off the ARPG Chronicon by the same developer.

name: Alys vs. the Phantom Feline Foe
description: An adventure game in the style of an early 90's Sierra adventure with a lewd twist! Alys is trapped in Bizarro World. Help her escape or she shall be trapped forever as the unwilling sex slave of Ignatius Cat, the Phantom Feline Foe.

name: Doraemon Giga Pad
description: Doraemon GIGA Pad is a portable tablet by Bandai. The tablet contains various educational games based on the Doraemon series.

name: Doraemon Step-Up PC
description: Doraemon Step-Up PC is a portable LCD laptop game by Bandai. It is based on the Doraemon series and contains various educational games which teach kids about maths, Japanese, science, among other things.

name: Stalker: The Way of Survival
description: A game with RPG elements and the melancholy beauty of a world that has survived a nuclear disaster. It has everything: a hero without memory, residents without help, enemies without punishment. Your task is to restore order, both in the outside world and in yourself. The main values ​​are eternal values: food, weapons, medicines... You are a stern character, not particularly talkative and purposeful. Have you woken up? Follow me! The village elder with the gentle name Anna will give you your first task.

name: In Search Of You
description: Rekindle the exhilarating sensation of youthful passion—to perfectly capture the essence of romantic endeavors, making the experience of falling in love both sweet and meaningful, and to inspire players with the beauty of love within the nightlife entertainment industry.

name: Dreamlike Love with Seira
description: Enjoy the memories with a beautiful maid in your dreams and heal your fatigue in reality.

name: Fugu
description: Eat as many carrots as you can while avoiding the shurikens coming your way.

name: Memory of Souls
description: Immerse yourself in the spellbinding world of Memory of Souls, a captivating visual novel where love and adventure come together. Choose your moments, explore a world...

name: Stalker 2
description: Continuation of the famous role-playing game Stalker. 30 years have passed and our hero is back again... Back to fight, not to retreat, to win! RPG fans will be pleased. The mobile game Stalker 2 offers them an entertaining plot, nice graphics. Control is possible both 4-button and 8-button, which will simplify the character's movements. Flexible settings of the mobile game are pleasing. Even the appearance of blood, the flight of bullets, shadows and the flow of water are adjustable.

name: Las gafas nuevas del yayo Carmelo
description:
Josemi's grandfather has been fitted with new glasses that make his eyes huge and, apparently, these glasses allow him to see far away.
A very short interactive fiction about a summer afternoon between a grandfather and a grandson.

name: A Life in Music
description:
Antonio and Silvia will never forget the Summer of 2008, the fortuitous meeting of two high school students who share a passion for music will upset their lives forever.
"A Life in Music" is a 2D side scrolling game with rhythm game elements in which the lives of the protagonists will cross with the life and music of Maestro Giuseppe Verdi. Produced by the Teatro Regio di Parma, the emotional experience combines multiple choices dialogues, dozens of characters and locations and over 20 original tracks to bring us on the screen dreams, friendships and fear.

name: Father and Son 2
description:
Father and Son 2 is the sequel to the first video game in the world produced by an Archaeological Museum (the MANN in Naples).
If in the first episode we had experienced the story of Michael who came to Naples to give the last farewell to his archaeologist father at the National Archaeological Museum of Naples, in Father and Son 2 we will find ourselves making important choices on the theme of love and family. The protagonist of the game this time is Gloria, already met in the past and now Michael's girlfriend. Employed at MANN as an assistant, waiting to finish her studies in Archeology, Sofia will accompany us on her journey to discover love and its many facets.
It will be a timeless love, as once again we will travel through the centuries, experiencing important chapters in the history of humanity. We will meet an ancient Etruscan in Capua in 475 BC, Cleopatra and Marco Antonio sailing in the Mediterranean and Charles Dickens at the time of his trip to Naples in 1844. Once again in the magnificent city that hosts the MANN, we will live the most tragic and exciting moments of the 4 days that shook Naples in 1943, during the Second World War.
Against the backdrop of these events, we will find ourselves visiting the halls of the MANN, one of the most important archaeological museums in the world, coming into contact with works and finds related to the historical characters present in the game.

name: A Whale's Journey
description:
Experience the journey of Giuliana, one of the most fascinating creatures to inhabit the waters of the Mediterranean. From the National Museums of Matera comes 'A Whale’s Journey,' depicting the life of a cetacean that becomes a metaphor for human existence.

You'll get to guide Giuliana through every stage of her life: from birth, navigating her first encounters in the marine environment, to adulthood and motherhood, where she cares for her young, up until reaching full maturity. A journey that unveils the fantastic marine setting in the Pleistocene era, featuring imaginative creatures and dangers to avoid, starting from Giuliana's birth until her disappearance. You'll discover the thrilling discovery of her skeleton in Lucanian territory, along the banks of the San Giuliano dam. A life's journey from the Pleistocene to the present, traversing geological eras, ocean depths, encountering new friends, and monstrous creatures.

name: Hexa Hysteria
description: Welcome, to the world of Hexa Hysteria! Experience our innovative game-play, unlock various music, and explore the incredible stories from the distant past!

name: Forza Horizon 5: Hide & Seek
description: Sin descripción

name: Diablo IV: Season of Hatred Rising
description:
Mephisto’s hatred has spread far and wide, creating nightmarish monstrosities to roam the land and reinstilling a sense of dread in the hearts of Sanctuary’s denizens. No one and nowhere is safe from the Lord of Hatred’s maddening influence, not even you.

Stand against encroaching hatred with fearsome new power in Diablo’s latest major update. Experience updated progression systems, more levels, gain all-new skills, discover new items, grow your glyphs to a new legendary level, and test your mettle in new difficulty levels that reward the most daring. Seek out and take down the Realmwalkers and explore the Seething Realms. Unite with allies via Party Finder and save Sanctuary from the relentless tide of Mephisto’s corruption.

name: Let's Build a Dungeon
description: Manage a game studio making the world’s greatest MMORPG. Hire designers, coders, and testers, create a fantasy world, then welcome hundreds of virtual players. If they get bored they will cancel their subscription and your investors will have your head. You can even play the game you create.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Forza Horizon 5: 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Jordan Luka 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellarcraft
description: Stellarcraft is a captivating sci-fi tower defense game that delves deep into the vast expanses of the universe, offering players the opportunity to explore planets, gather resources, and defend against numerous threats.

name: Dungeons of Dreadrock 2: The Dead King´s Secret
description: Dungeons of Dreadrock - The Dead King's Secret is Part 2 of the (yet unfinished) Dreadrock Trilogy. In this episode you'll puzzle and fight your way through the ancient cavern parts of Dreadrock Mountain. The game features 100 levels, 5 bosses, two different endings and tons of adorable pixel art.

name: Bauhaus Bonk
description: In this single-player game of skill, the movement is not straightforward. Switch between pivot points to maneuver your way through Bauhaus art-inspired arcade levels. Avoid obstacles, reach the goal and beat the high score!

name: The Games You Make
description: “Quit your job, take out a loan and make a top seller game” sounded like a great idea two months ago. Now, you’re chasing bizarre bugs, combining features that should never go together, and striving to capture that mysterious thing called “fun”. Every decision is yours—and so are the consequences.

name: Milk
description: DROP WORKING NOW Milk is a clicker type game in which you just have to click milk. Simple as that! Milks drops every 1, 3 and 5 hours. Milks also can be made by community on discord. Enjoy and expand your collection of milks!

name: Hamster Combat
description: Hamster Clicker is a clicker game about collecting hamsters! Every 3 and 18 hours, you get dropped a chest with hamsters!

name: Poop
description: Poop is an idle-clicker game where you click poop to get more poop

name: Dog
description: Dog is a clicker game, in which you click on Doge! In Dog, click on the Doge to get even more dog! Get a dog every two hours for a limited time!

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Versus
description: Sin descripción

name: Dog
description: Click on dog. Give him a hat. Get him a toy. Such happy.

name: Pizzeria
description: Click to eat delicious pizzas, buy powerful upgrades, and become the ultimate pizza master. Seek out exclusive drops to make your collection unique. Can you get them all? Start clicking now and rise to pizza greatness!

name: Tarisland: Season 1 - Blight Dragon Elegy
description: Sin descripción

name: Command & Conquer: Legions - Season Red Alert
description: Sin descripción

name: Banana Cat
description: Banana Cat is a simple clicker in which you click a “catnana” (a fusion from a cat and a banana). If you wait a specific amount of hours you’ll obtain cat bananas, some cat bananas will also be drawn by YOU in our discord server. What are you waiting for? Come and click banana cats with us!

name: Arena Breakout: Infinite - Season 0
description: Sin descripción

name: Mob Trader
description: Poke the dungeon and stick around to see what comes out! Every 60 minutes you will receive a tradeable mob in the form of a Steam Item. Grow an impressive collection of unique mobs to show off and trade with other players on the Steam Market!

name: Nightingale: Realms Rebuilt
description: Sin descripción

name: Gnome Escape
description: A masterful survival game inspired by the likes of such classics Snake, developed by cocoyroach entertaiment, Gnome Escape is just a start of something bigger.

name: Apple Clicker
description: Easy clicker game for apple enjoyers!

name: Adventure In XX City 2: Finding BB
description: Sin descripción

name: Fruits
description: You get a fruit every fixed hours of game time, each fruit is different it ranges from rarity, fruit and a multiplier to your basket clicking. You can also chop any unwanted fruit into fruit bits and use those to craft another fruit Each fruits and bits can be traded and sold.

name: Giraffe
description: Welcome to the world of Giraffe Clicker – an addictive clicker game where every click brings you closer to a new giraffe! Tap the screen, earn points, and collect rare and unique giraffes, each with its own special traits and abilities.

name: Horsle
description: A word guessing game, where players have six attempts to determine the mystery word (which is always 'horse') by guessing five-letter words and using hints revealed by the placement of the letters within their guesses.

name: Torpedo Alley
description: Take your submarine to se nd sink the convoy of ships. The smaller the vessel, the larger your score tally. Beware. The convoy is protected by an escort or anti-submarine aircraft who once in sight will seal your fate and send you to the sea-bed for good! To avoid the watery end, dive as soon as you hear the aircraft approaching, and wait below the surface until you think it is safe to return. Good luck Commander!

name: Guess My Word
description: A daily word guessing game that is an unofficial clone of one that used to be available on the website simbase.org. Players select a difficulty and attempt to guess a new mystery word each day, where each guess reveals whether the mystery word appears before or after the guess's position in the dictionary. Leaderboards track the fastest finish times and the finishes with the fewest guesses. Players can also play through an archive of all previous days' challenges.

name: Mars Attracts
description: Mars Attracts is a park management sim set in the iconic universe of Mars Attacks. Build rides, hire staff, manage guest needs, and abduct humans to serve as the star attractions. You'll face demanding visitors, environmental hazards, and the ever-looming threat of human escapes!

name: Croak
description: Croak is a nimble -and challenging- precision platformer featuring an innovative grapple mechanic. Use the prince’s tongue to dash and bounce around through hundreds of hand-crafted rooms. Manipulate the environment as you traverse distinct biomes, each with unique gameplay mechanics and bosses.

name: Will: Follow the Light
description: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

name: Rogue Waters
description: Rogue Waters is a tactical turn-based rogue-lite in a cursed pirate world. Build a fierce crew of rogues and form alliances with mythical creatures as you navigate an ever-changing world and master combat on land and sea. The crew and the Kraken await your command—will you heed the call?

name: Dfuse
description: FPS meets MOBA in DFUSE’s adrenaline-fueled mashup. Wield realistic military tools and outsmart your rivals in quick-fire matches that blend strategic depth with adrenaline-pumping action. Plant the bomb, secure the defusal, or dominate the battlefield.

name: Faaast Penguin
description: "Faaast Penguin" is an action-packed racing game where up to 40 penguins compete in a chaotic race to the finish. Players can unleash attacks, ride on ultimate rides, use shortcuts, and outpace rivals to reach the finish line first.

name: Maui The Shapeshifter
description: Play as Maui the demigod in an adventure to save his island home from a darkness that threatens to consume it. Transform into majestic animals, meet spirit Aumakua, explore unique biomes, face epic bosses, and defeat nefarious enemies in this epic hand-painted 2D open world Metroidvania.

name: Echoes of Mystralia
description: Mages of Mystralia's award-winning spellcrafting system enters a new era. Free Mystralia from the Shadows of the Past in this action-RPG roguelite. Create an infinite variety of spells to save the Memory of the World.

name: Nightmare House: Reimagined
description: No sleeping beyond this point. Slash through nightmares, twist reality, and uncover the hidden secrets of Nightmare House.

name: God Save Birmingham
description: Doom has come to Birmingham, and you are the last soul alive. Survive an undead plague in a painstakingly recreated medieval market town. Manage your needs, master physics-based mechanics, and evade the horde for as long as you can.

name: Banana 2: Fruit
description: Bop your banana.

name: Section 13
description: Sin descripción

name: Wilmot Works It Out
description: Wilmot Works It Out is a puzzle building game about completing beautiful images and using them to decorate the walls of your house.

name: Egg Surprise
description: A fun clicker with economic simulation in the penguin kingdom. Obtain rare collections, venture into dangerous dungeons, and build your own civilization!

name: Coin
description: Invest in ChadCoin by simply clicking! In ChadCoin, you click the Coin to gain even more Coins! Get a random coin every time you click enough and grow your collection!

name: Blackthorn Arena: Reforged
description: Re-experience the thrill and challenges of managing a Gladiator arena in this management/simulation game. With new content with over 10 hours of gameplay, new graphics, Quality of Life updates, and all DLCs packed into this new experience, this is how Blackthorn Arena was meant to be experienced.

name: Huaxia: Warring States
description: Build your own epic story in the Huaxia: Warring States. Start a clan, conquer the lands, and build an empire. Or roam the Nine Provinces as a lone warrior fighting bandits and monsters. The choice is yours!

name: Doom: The Golden Souls 3
description: Explore giant colorful worlds while completing quests to obtain Golden Souls! You can fully explore the maps at your own pace, and even experience completed missions again!

name: Endoparasitic 2
description: Three limbs ripped off, infected with a deadly parasite, you must survive. Drag yourself through the hallways of an infested arcship, fight off twisted eldritch creatures, craft vaccines and ammunition, and escape to civilization.

name: Lost Ember: Remastered
description:
The remastered edition of the acclaimed adventure features 4k, HDR, and overall improved graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5. Apart from the visual improvements, it includes a brand-new Free Roam mode with a new open world spreading over several biomes that includes all playable animals and new mini-challenges!

Owners of the original game will be able to upgrade for a small upgrade fee!

A breathtakingly beautiful world holds the secrets of its past for you and your companion to uncover in this 5-hour journey.

name: Bentley Bear’s Crystal Quest
description:
Crystal Quest is a homebrew game and an unofficial sequel to Crystal Castles, with very different gameplay. You play as Bentley Bear in a side-scrolling platform game. Your task is to retrieve the five crystals of life that were stolen by your enemy Berthilda. There are various enemies along the way to avoid and various power-ups that will help in your quest.

The title was bundled with the Atari 7800+.

name: Poppy Playtime Triple Pack
description: ﻿THREE GAMES IN 1 PACK! Embark on an epic journey filled with mystery, puzzles, eerie environments and the most terrifying toy characters to ever come to life. Over a decade ago, all the employees of Playtime Co. mysteriously vanished, except for you. You must return and discover what really happened at the now abandoned factory of the most popular toy company in history. But beware the toys are now alive, and they may not be as friendly as they seem. Take your first steps into Playtime Co. with the first 3 chapters in the Poppy Playtime saga! Chapter 1: A Tight Squeeze - Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility...and don't get caught. Chapter 2: Fly in a Web - Descend deeper into the toy factory where mind-numbing puzzles and horrific toys await. Grapple and swing your way to safety. Try to escape - and don't let Mommy find you. Chapter 3: Deep Sleep - A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this frightening place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the puzzles, characters and clues you encounter...If you can survive.

name: DigDigDrill
description: DigDigDrill is an underground mining and resource collecting game. Dig freely for minerals and treasures. Use the items you collect to forge your original drills in a hack-and-slash style equipment system.

name: Warriors of Nova Thera
description: Warriors of Nova Thera is a roguelike action-adventure where you play as Pixelmons! Explore and battle your way through the different biomes and discover exciting encounters. Collect shardstones from your expeditions out into the wild and use them back in the game hub to unlock upgrades and become stronger.

name: SubwaySim 2
description:
Dive into Simuverse Interactive's new public transport simulation!
SubwaySim 2 allows you to explore not only the underground network of Hamburg but now also that of the German capital Berlin! Face various unique scenarios and transport your passengers safely and punctually from station to station.

name: Galactic Economy
description: Can you become a leader in the Galactic Economy? Buy spaceships and spacestations on you way to get some additional income. Roll the dice and see what you can achieve in this board game.

name: Hoomanz!
description: A Planet in Peril - Embrace the darkness, save Erf! Step into the paws of Shoo, a mysterious, mythical creature with a hidden dual nature, in this charming casual adventure game. You're tasked with a mission: rid planet Erf of the ignorant Hoomanz invaders!

name: Sigilfarer
description: Sigilfarer is a roguelite adventure where every decision rests on the roll of your dice. Master a dice-building system while navigating a sprawling, procedurally generated world. Strategize your route, manage resources and push your luck to the limit!

name: Kinu Shoku Ryuu Hana: Weaving The Blue Orient
description: Kinu Shoku Ryuu Hana is another Touhou shooting game which is, unfortunately, not very popular due to lack of publicity. With standard gameplay, the gameplay mechanics rely on 2 features: spell card system and spark counter, with the spell card system the player may choose 2 of 7 different spell cards before embarking on a mission. The spark counter consumes magic gauge and is basically very similar to a bomb that will fire lasers to eliminate enemies and bullets. The game's story is around Marisa who is investigating magic fluctuations.

name: Hela
description: Become a brave mouse familiar in a heartwarming 3D adventure through stunning Scandinavian landscapes. Solve puzzles, explore, and brew magic potions to find a cure for your befriended Witch. Experience a healing journey like no other!

name: Micro Wars
description: Micro Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game that throws you into the action in short, intense online battles featuring up to 8 players. Tailor your strategy with a variety of commanders and units, build your base, mine some minerals, and micro your way to victory. Hone your skills with the campaign and custom maps, and demonstrate your prowess to climb the ranks!

name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2: Ricco Harbor
description: Sin descripción

name: Trigger Knight
description:
An Experimental Mini-Survival RPG that uses one-button mechanics!
Guide the Knight to defeat as many enemies as she can before her health energy ends!

name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2: The Shell Secret
description: Sin descripción

name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2: Wuhu Island from Mario Kart 7
description: Sin descripción

name: WinDepth
description:
WinDepth is a Windows game developed by the Japanese freeware group Bio_100%. It’s an arrangement of the 1992 shooting game SuperDepth (originally for PC-9801) for Windows.
In WinDepth, players control a warship moving on the water’s surface while countless submarines lurk underwater. The objective is to destroy the submarines while avoiding their torpedoes and mines.

name: Sports: Renovations
description: Give sports facilities a second life in this relaxing first-person simulator! Restore the glory of old gyms, courts and pitches as you try to make enough money to save your hometown basketball court.

name: Bungo to Alchemist
description: Sin descripción

name: Half-Life 2: Game of the Year Edition
description:
The critics agree, Half-Life 2 has been named PC GAME OF THE YEAR by over 35 organizations worldwide. Play the game that set a new benchmark in gaming with its startling realism, digital actors, advanced AI, and physical gameplay.

+ Also Includes:
Counter-Strike: Source
Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
Half-Life: Source

name: Park Ranger Simulator
description: Manage your own park facility in a huge open world in Park Ranger Simulator. Take on all the tasks that need to be completed as a park ranger - alone or together in cross-platform multiplayer! You have a variety of vehicles and equipment at your disposal to complete the challenges ahead!

name: Hexahedral
description: Hexahedral is a cuboid, challeging, 3D platformer, physics based, puzzle game with specific mechanics and surreal atmosphere, where you need to understand how your movement works and use your abilities to your favor to reach as high as you can. This game is intentionally difficult and confusing at some points, though the mechanics are pretty simple, once you learn how to move propperly, you will notice it isn't enough for you to overcome it, you must as well have patience and be persistent, then you may be able to reach the end. This journey depends completly on you, so don't give up, and remember, it can always get worse.

name: Slimey Climbey Chambers
description:
Help Sobay the Slime get out of this strange tile maze! Use goop to propel yourself to new heights, and gain new forms and abilities by collecting the mega slime essence!

Made for the GMTK 2024 Jam in 96 hours, for the theme "Built to Scale!"

name: Terminal City
description:
What if you took 80s adventure games like Space Quest, crossed them with auto-runners like Canabalt and threw in a dash of Another World?

You'll need all your wits, cunning, and typing skills to make it in TERMINAL CITY, as you guide street-kid V-Loc on his quest to evade the evil Syndicate corpos and rescue his friends.

In a world of instant-deaths, no checkpoints and dead ends, how far will YOU get?

name: The Strawman Augment
description: Sin descripción

name: The Fight of the Sumo-Hoppers
description: The Fight of the Sumo-Hoppers is a physics-based fighting game by Tuomas Korppi. Radioactive wrestlers weighing several megatons fight in the Cement Desert on the planet of Musculia in this ancient holy sport.

name: The Last Scaler
description: A Foddyvania, where you build yourself up from scrap, collect new abilities, and scale a sacred mountain.

name: Mario Doom
description: Mario Doom is an awesome unofficial mod of Doom created by Valigarmander that runs in Zandronum and GZDoom. A port running on Vanilla Doom was later made by Doomkid. The Mod acts as a texture pack replacing enemy and gun sprites alongside sound effects and animations. Since it is vanilla-compatible, it will run with any port, including the 2024 release of Doom on PS5, Switch, and Xbox.

name: Magic Survivors
description: Magic Survivor is an adventure - roguelike survivor game with a unique storyline. You are not a lone survivor, tiny survivor, or zombie survivor... You are a strong magic survivor, a cute but clumsy one with unknown power and ready to face up with the monster.

name: Meow Cat Village
description:
A passive game where hearts gather even when you're idle!
Collect hundreds of decorating items.
Welcome even cuter cats with costumes.
The more you decorate, the more diverse and unique customers come.
Decorate the garden, harvest vegetables, and open a beachside restaurant!

name: Mechanic Legends
description:
It’s Mechanic Time! Collect parts and assemble various robots to fight!
The ultimate material, MK-999, can change our future, but the bad monsters have stolen it! Gather all available techniques to fight against monsters, and try to change the future!

name: Horizons: The End Of Words
description: Humanity has written all there is to write about anything and everything. Words will soon lose all meaning. Find fragments of lost words drifting in space and explore the universe through your prose.

name: Luggage Lane
description: Luggage Lane is an action-packed game where you take on the role of a check-in agent named Lane who has to work a shift alone. Your goal is to process luggage as fast as you can on 3 check-in desks.

name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
description: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city. A new title, "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" now in development please look forward to the release of more information.

name: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die
description: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die is an action-packed, rogue-lite adventure in the world of Random. Play as Queen Aleksandra and wield her living die-companion Fortune, as they go all in against the ancient evil that took everything from her.

name: Musicmenia
description: Musicmenia is a strategic and musical card game. Face off online against other players, build your deck, and adapt your strategy to win. Adjust the tempo and lead your concert to victory!

name: Bubble Tower 3D
description: Bubble Tower 3D is a bubble shooter arcade game in which you have to destroy the colored balls in the cylinder-shaped area. This game comes with a cool Aztec theme! Try to connect at least 3 bubbles of the same color to destroy the spheres and reach the top of the tower. Not enough action? Try the destructive fireball and watch it work its magic. Reach the highest score.

name: The First Descendant: Season 1
description:
Step into the action in The First Descendant’s thrilling Season 1 Update: Invasion starting August 29th!
Tackle new dungeons, unlock fresh content, and play as Hailey, the new sniper Descendant.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator: World Update 18
description: World Update XVIII provides pilots the highest resolution yet for the stunning scenery of Germany, Austria, and Switzerland.

name: Box Bop
description: Box Bop is a simple game where you just get to tinker and play with funny physics with boxes and spheres and stuff in a ball pit. Just made as a fun little tinker game...?

name: Fallout 76: Milepost Zero
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallout 76: Gleaming Depths
description: Sin descripción

name: Mightreya
description: Join schoolgirl superhero Reya and her manager Nio as they embark on their journey as Hero Content Creators, fighting monstrous beings that emerge daily from a dimension beyond. Anime-inspired, heart-pounding hero action is waiting for you!

name: Rhythm Heaven Megamix: Sonic 2 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hatch
description: Eat up all the food which falls from the sky one after the other. The more you eat, the more fantastic transformations will occur. First, only meat will fall; then when the other things fall down, change the body color to match the food type.

name: Gourmet
description: An unfortunate adventure game about an apocalypse, and apartment building, and its murderous, cannibalistic landlord. Find hidden items to help your neighbors, seek a way to escape the apartment building, and discover four unique endings based on your choices!

name: Crankventure Capitalist
description: You wake up in a cold sweat and your mom is gone!! The only thing you know is...that kidnapper up there on screen must have taken her! Go! Be a good kid! Help HERRRR!

name: MacMan And The Caber Eater
description:
Meet MacMan, the canny Scot who takes children on fun-packed maths adventures.

MacMan and the Caber Eater teaches addition and subtraction and shows some of the relationships between numbers. By adding and subtracting, children help MacMan to build up a caber, piece by piece, and then toss it. Easy? Not when the dreaded Caber Eater appears on the scene and tries to steal the pieces away!

The program has five levels of difficulty, a built-in assessment device, and a 'help' sequence for children having difficulty.

This software was devised by educationalists and has been tried and tested in schools and homes. The program was wrtitten by Intelligent Software, creators of high quality educational software for 4-8 year olds.

name: MacMan And The Great Escape
description:
Meet MacMan, the canny Scot who takes children on fun-packed maths adventures.

MacMan and the Great Escape teaches children about shape and area, and about the effects of rotation and reflection. MacMan is guarding some prisoners trapped behind a wall. As if by magic, holes of different shapes and sizes appear in the wall. Children help MacMan stop his prisoners escaping by selecting shapes of the appropriate area, then manipulating them by rotation and/or reflection to fit each hole. If they are too slow, the prisoners break out and terrible things happen to MacMan!

The program features suberb special graphics effects, and a range of six difficulty levels.

This software was developed by educationalists and has been tried and tested in schools and homes. The program was written by Intelligent Software, creators of high quality educational software. For 5-9 year olds.

name: Riddles with Sir Connery
description: Sin descripción

name: FNF Weekly
description: A new FNF mod every single week? You must be tweaking, boss!

name: NHL 25
description: From the modernized skating of Next-Gen Vision Control and an overhaul of Chel’s AI player movement to authentic Reactive Action animations — experience true hockey intelligence.

name: 13th Friday Night: Funk Blood
description: Boyfriend and Girlfriend have decided to join up few campers for a camping trip, while hanging out by themselves they decided to have some fun, but unknown to them they have entered the forbidden territory and their presence has reawakened the dormant killer.

name: JimsDay
description:
A multiplayer VR game where you can hangout with your friends or random players.
Or you can play a different singleplayer gamemode like sandbox where you can mess around with different objects you can spawn in.

name: Sonic Legacy
description: Sonic Legacy; A re-imagining of the original VS Sonic.EXE mod made by original developers and prominent figures in the Sonic.EXE community, dedicated to the history of Sonic.EXE and other surrounding freaky media, connected characters, and creepypastas.

name: Lysium: Stardiver
description: In the distant rings of the planet Alphios, rookie mechanic Samantha Krain takes her first careful steps into the field as an official member of a crew of misfit space salvagers. When a huge salvage mission turns up on the surface of the planet, however, the race is on as opportunity calls to be the first one to reach a trove of technology. Is it fortune smiling upon the intrepid explorers, or is treachery leering from the shadows...?

name: FNF: Executable Mania
description: FNF: EXEcutable Mania was a Friday Night Funkin' creepypasta mod created by danii. The mod planned to star several EXEs and internet horrors in a grab bag fashion. It has 7 songs on its demo, with more planned on its full release.

name: Mario Racing Tournament
description: Join Mario, his friends, and also his enemies, in the Mario Racing Tournament game. Participate at the biggest racing tournament in the Mushroom Kingdom!

name: Friday Night Funkin' vs. LSE
description:
Vs. LongestSoloEver is a Friday Night Funkin' Mod featuring YouTube guitarist LongestSoloEver, with all new original music, artwork, charting, remixes and more.

The full week features five songs, and two "mania mode" remixes.

name: Una noche sin nombre
description: This is a world where witches and demons dwell on the fringes of reality. Charles finds himself in the rain, seeking shelter when he encounters a woman in the forest who asks him for a favor—to search for something very precious to her. At that moment, Charles finds a house and ventures inside, where he encounters a mysterious girl.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Hex
description: What's this? Your Girlfriend's father is making an award show and you're invited? Seems like nothing can go wrong! Besides that, a familiar face appears. It's Hex! Your robotic lookin' fella from before seems to have a performance scheduled during the event and he asks for your help. With the whole country watching you, people you fought before, and your Girlfriend, there's no way you could lose!

name: FNF: V.S. Tabi Ex Boyfriend
description: Your girlfriend, invited by her dad's friend for some unknown reason, asks you to come along with her. When you arrive at the place, there was no one, except for one weird guy that scared your girlfriend out. Will everything go well or is something bad going to happend

name: Pharaoh's Purse
description: An economy focused tower defense where you play as an Egyptian pharaoh seeking to reclaim his lost wealth in modern times.

name: Payday 3: Gold Pass
description: The Payday 3 Gold Pass includes all four Year 1 Expansions - Syntax Error, Boys in Blue, Houston Breakout, and Fear and Greed - as well as some special bonus content.

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Tailor Pack
description:
Pick a side of the law and stick to it, or play both sides and get paid twice.
In the Houston Breakout you’ll find everything you need to blend in with criminals and law professionals.

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Weapon Pack
description: Guns, guns, guns! The only thing better is guns that put out more bullets! Which is exactly what you get with the Houston Breakout Weapon Pack, three burstfire weapons slinging lead in 3-round bursts.

name: Payday 3: Houston Breakout Heist
description:
Houston is on trial for a slew of crimes, and Concord is lurking behind the scenes, waiting to snap him up the second the sentence is rendered.

Whether you sneak your way through and pass without trace, or smash your way through the judiciary system with your own brand of justice is your choice; either way, Houston has a problem, and it’s your job to solve it.

name: Shapez 2: Supporter Edition
description:
Show your support and get two unique rollercoaster inspired track pieces for your space railways, plus 40 minutes of additional music and the full soundtrack!

Rollercoaster Railway Pieces
Use the Twist and the Loop to add some rollercoaster flair to your railway lines!

Additional Music
Unlock additional 40 minutes of in-game music from the composer of the original shapez soundtrack, Petter Sumelius, with some tracks by Patrik Pettersson.
Official Soundtrack

The upgrade includes access to the full soundtrack, including the base game music and the additional music for a total of 80 minutes sci-fi inspired electronic music, keeping the essence of the original shapez sound while adding a touch of space to fit the new theme. High quality FLAC versions of every track are included.

name: Diner Out
description: Merge matching kitchen ingredients to cook delicious dishes and keep hungry customers happy in this cozy game. Turn your café into the talk of the town!

name: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets
description: It’s your first day at Monster High, where all monsters are welcome… but some strange events are happening. Can you uncover the mystery of the doors and ancient keys and bring the school back to its authentic, spooky self? Play and discover its skulltimate secrets. Create your unique monster character with a vault full of different monster kinds, skills, and scary-chic looks to choose from. Explore the school with your beasties Clawdeen Wolf, Draculaura, and Frankie Stein, and find creeperific clues and powerful new skills. As the newest member of the Boo Crew, you’re in for one hex-citing adventure!

name: AAA Clock 2
description:
In a world where most clocks are either boring or colorless, AAA Clock 2 is going to change everything.

This autumn AAA Clock will prove once again that sequels can be just as extraordinary as the originals. Customize your clock and set up alarms in this engaging clock experience.

There is more! Sink into the built in platformer game Jelly&Vulca. A continuation of the game first introduced in the original AAA Clock. Customize your character and set out on an epic adventure.

name: AAA Clock 2: Color Set 2
description:
Add more colors to your clock with the new AAA Clock 2 DLC.
Choose dark blue, orange or cyan.

name: Troy: The Red Winged Hero
description: Play as Liam Newguard in a Item-Turn Based RPG game about weird things nobody asked for. Run through many locations finding new skills and spells for each of your party member's two classes. Enjoy well over 15 hours of gameplay/story in this conglomerate of inspirations I created for thee.

name: Subway Surge
description: Subway Surge is a fun endless runner game featuring pirate heroes. Navigate using your mouse, and collect gold coins by running, jumping, and sliding. Help the pirates gather all the gold!

name: Weird O's: Chaos Royale
description: Dive, dodge, and dash your way to victory in the wildest fantasy brawl! Weird O's: Chaos Royale is a 3D platforming battle royale like no other, blending hilarious co-op exploration with chaotic free-for-alls. Team up to gather crystals, unleash your animal spirit and conquer wacky obstacle courses.

name: Tenderhearted
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Detention (Rescribbled)
description: Dead Detention is a scribbly interactive story about a nerdy teen turned dooms day survivor! Play as 15 year old Max as he tries to escape his high school during a deadly zombie pandemic! Will he and his new friends get to safety?!

name: Gremlins
description:
The Atari 2600 adaption of the 1984 film, "Gremlins".

In this version, on the first screen, Mogwai are jumping from the roof to get at hamburgers on the ground. You, as Billy, must catch them before the hit they ground. If you get them all, it is off to the next, faster, level. If you miss eight, then you go to a shooting screen.

On the shooting screen, gremlins are approaching from the distance. You must shoot them before they reach you. If one reaches you, you lose a life. After they are all dead, it is back to the first screen at a faster level. In later levels, puddles of water will divide the gremlins in two.

A different version of the same name was also released for the 5200, Commodore 64 and Apple II.

name: Second Wind
description: Second Wind is a roguelike RPG in which you'll explore random dungeons as you battle monsters, upgrade your equipment and complete quests. You can choose and unlock new characters to play with, each character has 3 stats: dexterity, power and armor, which will increase or decrease during your adventure. Each character also has 3 unique battle moves, use them wisely!

name: Cursebane
description: Cursebane is a fast-paced, stylish katana-action roguelite. Step into the forest of fate, where your choices twist your journey. Empower your sword and spells as you seek out those doomed by prophecy and save them from the Curse.

name: Clutter
description: The first un-hidden object game in the long running Clutter series of PC games

name: The Pyrite Talisman
description: The Pyrite Talisman is a 3D graphic adventure involving exploration in third person direct movement, puzzle solving and inventory use through a point & click interface. During gameplay the player will play with two characters switching through time to collect informations to progress further into the story.

name: Pokémon Emerald: Seaglass
description:
Pokemon Emerald Seaglass is a romhack of Pokemon Emerald with many alterations.

Notable features include:

- Complete visual overhaul of all game graphics to fit a cozy, GBC-like aesthetic

- All Pokémon from Generations 1-3 are obtainable, along with cross-generation evolutions (ex: Roserade, Mamoswine, Farigiraf)

- Tweaks to many traditionally “bad” Pokémon to make them more interesting and usable (ex: Ghost/Flying Noctowl, Grass/Dragon Sceptile, Water/Fire Octillery)

- Updated battle engine to most recent games (Physical/Special split, Fairy type, etc.)

- New minigames and events to bring life to Hoenn, such as a Scuba Diving competition in Pacifidlog Town and Pinball games used to unlock rare items and Alolan Eggs!

- Follower Pokemon

- The Rustboro City Wishing Well, using Wishing Star items as a currency in a gacha-like system to get random Pokémon! Great for shaking up repeat playthroughs

- Cheat codes accessible in-game via the Player’s GameCube

- Hard Mode (disabled by default), Soft Level Cap toggle (enabled by default), and more settings accessible by interacting with book on Player’s desk

name: Rubber Head Bob
description: It's a mountain climbing game with a rubber-headed human! The controls are incredibly challenging! Bounce around like crazy!

name: Snow Wave Community Project
description: Snow Wave Community project is Christmas holiday project that ran from 2023 November to January 2024. Initially, there were 21 levels submitted, but for undisclosed reasons, it became 20 levels pack. Difficulty goes from easy to really hard, use difficulty skills provided if you find set too hard to manage!

name: High Speed Race: Need for Asphalt Racing
description:
Drive 10 extremely fast and beautiful cars on asphalt tracks. Start your career, win enough races and buy new cars to compete in more demanding races.

Start driving in unique cars - never seen before on the asphalt roads in reality and computer games.

name: Block Factory
description: Block Factory is a production and automation game focusing on creating 3D figurines from building blocks in a factory. Shape your models, design and optimize your assembly lines to bring your creations to life!

name: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era
description: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is the official prequel hailing back to the origins of the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games. Explore the map solo or in multiplayer, triumph in iconic battles and establish peace on a continent where it was never an option.

name: The Duck Song Game
description: The ever so loved The Duck Song has returned.

name: Xin Yi Tian Tu Long Ji
description: Xin Yi Tian Tu Long Ji was an RPG published in 2000 by Soft-World International Corporation. The game was adapted from The Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber, also known as Yi Tian Tu Long Ji, a famous Chinese martial arts novel by Jin Yong.

name: Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cope
description: The Cope is a 2D, point-and-click game that presents the fear of the unknown. Your night shift client service job as a janitor will start with you getting entangled in a series of strange stories in The Cope mansion. Work cleaning and serving your client and find the truth of this mansion of fear.

name: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare
description: Guilty: Takiko's Nightmare is a single-player story-based game. Play as Takiko to explore several areas inside her unique reality. Players can interact with various objects, solve puzzles, fight enemies, or discover some unreal phenomena.

name: Pokémon Blessed Shield
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghost Frequency
description:
Experience an episodic third-person psychological horror game that delves into the dark and sinister corners of abandoned haunted places. You are going to play as Maya, an urban explorer rookie on an adventure to uncover the hidden truth and gain fame on the streaming platform. Navigate through claustrophobic alleyways, uncovers new clues and whispers of rumors, revealing a web of mysteries and reveal the hidden truth.

Are you bold enough to confront the shadows and uncover the reality lurking beneath?

name: Super Mario Odyssey DS
description: Sin descripción

name: Psycho Dead
description: A third-person survival horror game that you play as a girl with psychic power who tries to escape from a secret lab and is pursued by deadly stalkers.

name: New Super Mario 64 DS
description: Sin descripción

name: DeMyth
description: DeMyth is a short puzzle game inspired by Helltaker. In it, you Interact with cute demit girls to find your missing aunt in the Astral Realm.

name: Onward: Asylum
description: Going onwards as we escape this horrific asylum— an indie 2D horror sidescroller where your task is to get out of the facility without getting captured by the monster itself.

name: Pikmin 3 Sunshine
description: Sin descripción

name: Disconnect
description: Late-night call with your friend keeps on DISCONNECTING. What'd you do if your friend wasn't who you thought they were?

name: Super Mario Kart Deluxe

name: La Perlas
description: A survival horror set in the Philippines.

name: Demon Guardian
description:
Four girls and a newbie witch doctor explore their friend's haunted house. Although welcoming at first glance, the house shows its true colors when night falls...

Based on the ghosts and beliefs of Thai folklore, Demon Guardian is a visual novel with multiple endings, told from the perspective of Pim, a girl who attract spirits. She quickly drew the attention of the new transfer student, who seems to have a ton of these spirits under his control...

description: Multimedia Edition adds video segments such as tutorials, course previews and tips as well as more voiced samples and sounds for a more interactive experience.

description: A suika-like where you merge animals and go for the high score! It also features a low gravity mode.
