description:
Add more colors to your clock with the new AAA Clock 2 DLC.
Choose pink, gray or red.

name: MP3: Ghastly Graveyard
description: Sin descripción

name: AAA Clock 2: Color Set 3
description:
Add more colors to your clock with the new AAA Clock 2 DLC.
Choose pale pink, blue or yellow.

name: AAA Clock 2: Color Set 4
description:
Add more colors to your clock with the new AAA Clock 2 DLC.
Choose light blue, light green or dark green.

name: AAA Clock 2: Color Set 5
description:
Add more colors to your clock with this DLC.
Choose khaki, light gray or purple.

name: AAA Clock 2: Jelly Clock
description:
Customize your clock with this DLC.
Your favorite Jelly character on the clock face.

name: AAA Clock 2: Vulca Clock
description:
Customize your clock with this DLC.
Your favorite Vulca character on the clock face.

name: AAA Clock 2: Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes the third Color Set DLC with pale pink, blue and yellow.

name: Ramboat 2
description: Get ready for the frenetic action of Ramboat 2! Confront enemies of all types: from paratroopers to tanks, and defeat the final bosses that will appear in the different levels. You'll have a large arsenal of weapons and grenades at your disposal, as well as vehicles to help you in your mission. Equip yourself with gadgets to increase your skills on the battlefield and play anywhere, as no internet connection is required! Download Ramboat 2 now and become the hero of the war.

name: AAA Clock 2: Extended Edition
description: This bundle includes the first Color Set DLC with pink, gray and red.

name: AAA Clock 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Enjoy this extravagant timepiece along with the new Vulca Clock skin.

name: AAA Clock 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Enjoy this extravagant timepiece along with the new Jelly Clock skin.

name: Apes vs. Zombies
description:
Everything was so idyllic, but one day a horde of zombies appeared and stole your beloved Jane.

In Apes vs. Zombies, you will help our chief ape “Kong” defend his kingdom against the imminent zombie invasion and rescue your girlfriend Jane. What are you waiting for? Grab your bazooka and gather your monkey friends to give the zombies a good bang for their buck and free your Jane.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo: Kick'n'Run
description: Would you like to step into the boots of Cristiano Ronaldo, one of the best soccer players in the world? Experience the sensation of shooting and running like CR7 in this unique game of skill and precision! Connect to Facebook, strive for the highest scores, and you may end up competing against none other than Cristiano Ronaldo himself!

name: Aether Diving
description:
"The Aether Diving program aims to perceive energy levels in the body and help get rid of imperfections. These imperfections get in the way of a healthy lifestyle. Pairing the latest in technology and relentless study of the Divine Scriptures, we have kept our followers’ faults and defects at bay. Join us now, diving deep into consciousness and freeing the mind from torment. Enlightment awaits."
-High Priest Maxime

name: Rise Eterna Bundle
description: This bundle contains Rise Eterna & Rise Eterna War

name: Tiebreak: Ace Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Badminton Time
description: Get ready to move your arms to hit the badminton shuttlecock and become the new champion!

name: Find Room 96 + Exit Station 7 + The Eerie Surroundings + HighScore Anomaly Shop + HighScore Anomaly Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Fruit Attack!!
description: Merge the funny fruits and get the giant cherry!

name: Uboat Attack
description: Rise through the ranks and become a legendary commander!

name: Bubble Blaster DX
description: Pop, Bounce, and Conquer the Leaderboards in the Ultimate Bubble Blaster!

name: The Secret Behind the Exam Paper
description: A first person horror decryption game with bizarre rules

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: The Forty Thieves
description: The Forty Thieves is a downloadable content expansion package for Assassin's Creed: Mirage, which follows Basim Ibn Ishaq as he investigates the legend of the Forty Thieves. Initially given to players who pre-ordered the game, it was later made available to all players on Ubisoft Connect for 60 units.

name: Solaris 2
description: Free online MMORPG game. Play with your friends. Conquer the continent and be the best. This is a private server for Metin2.

name: Dark Seraphim
description: Dark Seraphim is an action role-playing game released for the PC-98 in Japan in 1995. The game is based on Christian mythology and you play as Alucard, a seraphim who was sent down to hell.

name: Sega vs. Capcom: The Next Level
description: Sega vs. Capcom: The Next Level is a fan game made by Madxruler that crosses over the two major franchises, resembling the combat style of Tatsunoko vs. Capcom.

name: Down Under
description: 12 speed-mapped Boom compatible levels (-cl 9) restricted to 500 linedefs (except for map12). Explore a desert base and the centre of the Earth with a banging soundtrack drawn from various Sonic games.

name: Scarlet Cross
description: Sin descripción

name: Peg Solitaire
description: Solve the puzzle one peg at a time.

name: Pacific Drive: Friendly Dumpster Customization Pack
description: The Friendly Dumpster has always been there for you. Proudly display your gratitude by decorating your station wagon with a pack of in-game trash themed cosmetic items.

name: Sniper Assassin 2
description: Sniper Assassin 2 continues with Shawn’s story as both an agent for the government and a paid assassin. This shooter game is simple, take out your targets but don’t harm any civilians or you’ll lose the mission.

name: Artifact Seeker: DLC 1 - The Legacy of Mortia
description: New characters, new maps, new boss, new Synergy, new artifacts, new events, and many more new contents await everyone’s exploration!

name: Rip Connections
description: Rip Connections is a SiIvaGunner inspired version based on Connections by The New York Times. The game showcases various rips from the channel and the player is tasked to sort them into 4 groups. Examples for these groups include a common source between rips, event day or theme of game ripped.

name: Harmonies
description: Find the common music themes.

name: Brute Horse
description: Sin descripción

name: 60 Minute Marathon 2
description: 60 Minute Marathon 2 is a 74-map MBF21-compatible gigawad made (mostly) in a single hour, just like last time, but with more than twice the friends, including me, @Synami, and new friends @Phoenyx and @OverflowingMocha, twice the "production quality" as last time, and even a completely bespoke soundtrack made by Phoenyx! Much like the first 60 Minute Marathon, this was mostly a fairly simple yet somewhat extreme mapping exercise, this time with four mappers all making 16 maps over an hour and deciding to jam them all together at the end alternating between each mapper, with maps only being edited after the designated hour to actually make them possible.

name: Piglet's Big Game
description: Point-and-click adventure game loosely based off the 2003 film Piglet's Big Movie, where the main objective is for Piglet to collect all the ingredients for a soup in the Hundred-Acre Wood's annual Very Large Soup Party.

name: Cold Steel
description: Cold Steel is a short but sweet Doom II mapset with a dark, grungy and sometimes cosmic aesthetic. It features 7 playable levels and 1 secret level.

name: Drömmar
description: Drömmar is a map based on images from Astar's dreams related to doom.

name: Epic Party Clicker
description:
Your parents are out of town and you’re finally by yourself… So, what time is it? It’s EPIC PARTY TIME!!! Get ready, because you’re going to throw the sickest event of all times! In this clicker game, tap to get more guests while you upgrade your celebration!

Don’t be a wallflower! You will start small... But, put on your dancing shoes, upgrade your space and sound equipment and become a real social butterfly! You can bring a jello bar, a zero-G dance floor, a viking metal band to rock out this party and even a time machine! How awesome is that?

name: Battle Wizard Attack
description: Unleash your inner spell caster in this action-packed, retro-style RPG! Choose from eight powerful magic disciplines and face monstrous hordes across sprawling maps packed with destructible chaos.

name: Slime Castle
description:
The bad humans are invading the mysterious forest! The slime kingdoms in the forest are facing a tremendous crisis!

As a slime chosen by the Slime Sage, you can enhance your abilities through battles, collect legendary equipment, utilize powerful skills, defeat waves of terrifying enemies, and safeguard the peace of the forest.

Once you are defeated, come back stronger!

Slime Castle is a role-playing idle tower defense game.

Players could enjoy an excellent role development system, countless powerful weapons, and several impressive battle scenes.

name: Orisries
description:
Orisries is an adult simulation game designed to immerse you into a fantasy world with its captivating plot and distinctive gameplay.
Recruit new heroes, including celestial beings, sect members, or elves; train the heroes and unlock new skills to help you conquer the world.

name: Sprawl 96
description: Sprawl 96 adds enemies and gameplay from the 2023 game Sprawl into the original Quake.

name: Kalimat Karash
description: Explore the world map by solving the diverse and exciting word puzzles.

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition
description:
Immerse yourself in a scenic horse ranch to experience the joy and pride of caring for a world-class stable of horses in Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition.
With the help of a friendly mentor, you’ll raise charming foals, care for and train a stable of unique horses, and compete to become a champion racer and rider.

name: Kokubyaku no Avesta: Aushedar
description:
Under the world of the first Divine Throne, two forces are killing each other relentlessly. Black and White, Light and Darkness, Good and Evil. Until the other is destroyed, the fighting will never stop. That is the instinct called Avesta.
Follow the wicked warrior Magsarion and his path of remorseless breaking dualism, along with Quinn, who is tasked with collecting a "miracle".

This is the first installment in a two-part visual novelization of the light novel by Masada Takashi, serving as a prequel to his earlier visual novel "Paradise Lost".

name: Reignbreaker
description: Lockpicks meet spiked iron gauntlets in this 'medievalpunk' single-player action-roguelike. Fight through hordes of lock-operated mechs and free the world from the corrupt elite. Plunder their coffers, smash the kingdom and become The Reignbreaker.

name: Hidalgo
description: Embark on the most iconic and cozy adventures from the classic novel "Don Quixote of La Mancha". In a handcrafted, colorful puppet world, you'll battle windmills, be knighted, will solve puzzles with Don Quijote and Sancho and fight for the love of your beloved Dulcinea.

name: Trickster Trove
description: Feel the fear and adrenaline in the deadly dungeons in search of treasures. Create impenetrable catacombs, protecting loot from other players. Test your skills and strategies in a world where every decision can be your last. One life - one chance!

name: Telly the TV
description:
Telly the TV is a throwback action/adventure platformer with a 1-bit style. You'll explore six themed worlds while collecting Remote Control Keys in a scavenger hunt gone wild. Can you defeat the baddies of TV Kingdom and restore the airwaves?

Enter six exciting and quirky worlds while bashing baddies and traversing terrible traps! Collect items to save each TV program, and face-off with the enemies of TV Kingdom.

name: Teletubes: Electronic Pet
description:
The infamous Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is here again!!!

The children's Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is a small console with an electronic animal that must be watched to grow up. The little electronic animal needs your personal care and attention to stay alive and grow.

name: Impish Rat Electronic Pet
description: Sin descripción

name: Micro Ninja
description: A game that fits into a 64 x 64 space, made to LOWREZJAM.

name: Stickya Adventurya
description: Stickya Adventurya is a comedy based platform puzzler.

name: Nodebuster
description: Nodebuster is a short, experimental incremental game about busting nodes and destroying reality.

name: Squirreled Away
description: Be the squirrel. Scurry through gardens, up trees, and leap limb to limb in this craft and thrive park life adventure. Explore solo or with up to three squirrel buddies in co-op. Meet and help other residents and collect bits here and there to build and decorate your dream treehouse.

name: Angel Night
description: In the miraculous World of Demons, there lived a vampiric count. One day, standing near the statue of the Goddess of Time, the count thought with sadness of everyone's mortal fate; at this moment the God of Death appeared, telling the count he has a visitor in his castle. The visitor turns out to be a succubus named Karuru, who suggests that the count trains two young female demons, Tiris and Emalis, and sends them to the other worlds...

name: Ano Ko Doko no Ko
description:
Anokodokonoko is a dating simulation board game released by Success in 1998 that features 2 main game mode:
- Story mode: Only one player game. In this mode there is a strong element of simulation. The hero (the player) has the purpose of meeting with the girl, and make her fall in love with him, the game in this mode features different events.
- Party mode: This mode can be played by up to 4 human players. This mode is more focused in the board game style but without squares and dices, since the game is also playable in the story mode game maps and is a sort of a competition between the human characters to win and know who between them got more friends or dates with the different girls.

name: Hoonigans
description:
Hoonigans is a top-down racing game which pays homage to the classic retro racers of yesteryear. The aim of the game is simple: prove your worth as you tackle the game's diverse array of tracks and challenges, and earn medals to unlock a host of characters, tracks, vehicles, and more!

The game comprises twelve challenging tracks, three playable characters, and a huge array of vehicles.

name: Anonono. Kimi to Sugoshita Ano Hi Ano Toki Ano Mirai
description:
The protagonist suddenly returns to those bygone days of three years ago ...

Leading a life choked with regret, just wishing that he could have one chance to set things right ...

The protagonist is an ordinary college student, living out his tedious days in relative peace. But even through his college life, he feels a kind of disquiet that is hard to place -- the root of which comes from the incidents of a certain failed school festival three years ago. After that time, the life and the friends that he had known were scattered to the winds, leaving him with the life he knows now.

But if he had the opportunity to do things over again, to set things right, what would he do?

name: Crash Bandicoot: Kart Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Bandicoot: Atlasphere Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Bandicoot: UFO Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Coco Bandicoot: Tiger Ride
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcshu: Kagerou no Jidai wo Koete
description:
Arcshu: Kagerou no Jidai o Koete is loosely related to the greater Arcus series. It is a visual novel created in the parody style, and in the process hits many common pop culture items of the day (movies, novels, comics, animation, etc.).
The story follows the main character, Jeda, through a series of still images and standard adventure-game puzzles and menu-based navigation as the player works through an overlaying mystery. As the story progresses, Jeda finds that there is a hole in his dimension, and the only way to repair this hole is to travel through other dimensions (and time) to seek out a mystical holy sword and a group of CDs that will restore things to their proper nature.
Throughout this journey, there are numerous cameos and other appearances by other Wolf Team and Nippon Telenet characters from various other media (The Valis Series, Midgarts, Final Zone, etc.). Musically, there are also numerous tracks that have been pulled from these same properties (and in some cases comically rearranged) and are used to good effect here.

name: Crunch Bandicoot: Submarine Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Dr. Neo Cortex: Inventor's Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: The Life of Me
description:
The story revolves around Oliver, an eighteen-year-old man who has just moved back to the town he grew up in. Amidst old friends and new acquaintances, he learns about the world of grown-ups; responsibilities, sexual exploration, and that everyone has secrets they wish to keep hidden.

Will he find love, uncover his friends' secrets, or just learn to enjoy what the world has to offer?

name: Chickaboom
description: A game where you have to knock down chicks with bubble gum bubbles.

name: Words Guesser
description:
Words Guesser is an engaging word puzzle game that brings the thrill of collaborative gameplay directly to your Twitch stream. In this game, you and your viewers work together to uncover hidden words from a jumbled board of letters displayed on your screen. With each round, you'll need to find as many words as possible, relying on your community’s quick thinking and sharp eyes.

Each level presents a unique board of scrambled letters, challenging you to discover a majority of the hidden words to advance. The game progressively increases in difficulty by introducing trick letters and mystery letters that only reveal themselves after a certain time or when a player successfully guesses them.

name: Golf: The Ultimate Collection
description:
This collections consists of:
- British Open Championship Golf Special Edition
- Greg Norman Ultimate Challenge Golf
- Picture Perfect Golf: Harbor Town Golf Links
- GolfAmerica (a golf guide)

name: Boosted Survivors
description:
Boosted Survivors is a sandbox rogue-like, filled to the brim with exciting secrets. Fight dangerous waves of enemies, find legendary upgrades, and boost your hero along the way.

Boosting lets you increase or decrease any value of your hero, weapons and abilities, giving you complete freedom to reinterpret the game in new and exciting ways. Every run is completely unique and limited only by your creativity.

name: Galactic Rusherz
description: A browser Shoot 'em up.

name: Cactiverse
description: The world of Cactiverse, where gardening meets dragon-fueled fun! Grow your cacti, unleash fireballs, and join a vibrant community on Discord. With weekly tournaments and hilarious gameplay, Cactiverse is your next obsession. Fun, challenging, and social—what more could you ask for?

name: Ninja Warz
description: Ninja Warz is a browser fighting game where you create and customize a clan of ninjas to battle against other players using different of weapons and relics.

name: Car!
description:
CAR! is a simple game set against a mountain backdrop under a nice blue sky. With the player controlling the car, traverse down the road, whilst trying not to fall off and avoiding obstacles along the way.

CAR was nominated for the BAFTA YGD (Young Game Designers) Game Making 10-14 Award Too!

name: Zombie Tactics
description: Tactical turn-based zombie survival game, featuring full story, survival mode, and alternative endings! Lead your team through the zombie apocalypse, earning items and skill points along the way. What ethical choices will you make later in the story?

name: Cat Astro Phi
description:
Created in the style of a Gameboy Classic title, this is a space-action pixel-art adventure!

There is much planet exploring, bot shooting, bomb exploding, lazer wall hacking, sentry gun evading, cat finding fun to be had.

name: Quartet
description: A puzzle game where you must match pieces of heads to earn points.

name: Garden Box
description: A garden-themed puzzle game.

name: A Bibelot: Prototo
description: A retro arcade game with several difficulty modes, as well as high score and best time stats.

name: Nemesis '90 Kai
description: Nemesis '90 Kai is an enhanced remake of Nemesis 2. The main difference lies in presentation, with higher-quality music and significantly more detailed graphics. The gameplay is mostly unchanged, with the exception of the possibility to equip four options on the player-controlled ship (as opposed to only two in the original version) and a few tweaks to secondary weapons and power-ups. Two new stages and four boss enemies have been added to this version.

name: Droplet
description: A platform game where you control Droplets.

name: Motioning Monument
description: This game that need a little imagination, exploring the abstract landscape and aim of revive mysterious monument. Collect motion fragments and place them in the right place to revive the monument. Enjoy the exploring and letting your imagination run wild!

name: Baldy Dash
description: A browser game based on Shaun the Sheep.

name: Cinnabar Nights
description: Cinnabar Nights is a first-person rpg with turn-based combat. Explore diverse landscapes, unearth powerful equipment, manage your resources, and harness otherworldly powers.

name: Kyobi
description: A browser puzzle game.

name: Tower Hover
description: Tower Hover is an endless building game where players stack sections of a skyscraper to create the tallest structure possible. The goal is to align each new section perfectly on top of the previous one. If the placement isn't accurate, the misaligned part gets cut off, making subsequent placements more challenging. The game ends when a section completely misses the tower. How high can you build before it all comes crashing down?

name: Correct Picture
description: Correct Picture is an engaging and educational game where players are challenged to match pictures on the left with their corresponding names on the right. The objective is to correctly pair as many names with images as possible. The more correct matches a player makes, the higher their score. This game tests and improves the player's recognition and association skills, making it both fun and informative.

name: Star Wars: Starfighter
description: Space flight arcade game based on the events of Star Wars Episode 1. The game shares a title of the home release of the same name, however is a completely unique game.

name: Parcel Escape
description: Help the little furry lump get out of this strange post office, where obstacles await at every turn.

name: SimCity 2000: Scenarios Volume 1: Great Disasters
description:
Scenarios Volume 1: Great Disasters is an expansion pack for SimCity 2000. This particular addition adds a total of 10 harrowing scenarios which range from a fictitious UFO attack in Atlanta, Georgia – in Dec. 2050 no less – to the very real great Mississippi floods of 1993 (the Davenport flood in this particular instance). Play SimCity 2000 Scenarios Volume 1: Great Disasters online!

This expansion was bundled with SimCity 2000 Bonus Cities and Scenarios and the SimCity 2000 Urban Renewal Kit for Maxis’ 1995 release of a special CD-ROM edition of SimCity 2000.

name: Farm Champions: Harvest Battle
description: A unique blend of classic snake gameplay and harvesting simulators. Try out these new battle arenas and prove you are the one and only champion.

name: Flippy Jump
description: You close the door of your refrigerator and an interesting life begins inside. Fruits and vegetables try to escape from this big white cage. Break everything around you and smash through shelves to find a way out. The more precise the timing of the jump, the more powerful the impact. That's exactly what you need to succeed! Try to get out all the fruits and vegetables out of the fridge. Carrot, cucumber, sausage, and even a spoon for some reason.

name: Space Bouncer
description: In Space Bouncer, player controls a character equipped with a jetpack. Upon hitting a wall, the character bounces off and changes direction. The goal is to avoid obstacles and collect as many points as possible. As player accumulates higher scores, the game speeds up, increasing the difficulty. Navigate through the challenging environment and aim for the highest score while avoiding hazards.

name: Hoky
description:
Hoky is a minimalist local multiplayer game from the abstract minds of Kitty Calis and Jan Willem Nijman, with audio by Eirik Suhrke.
A non-traditional take on the classic sport of hockey, HOKY bends the rules and intentionally avoids deep knowledge of the source material.
Ignorance or a fresh perspective? There's only one way to find out!
Up to 4 players grab their sticks and slide onto the ice, cheered on by dynamic audience AI and their personal lust for sports.

name: Hellmouth
description: Hellmouth is a competitive cooking game where players collect ingredients from a hellish death course and cook it to perfection to feed Satan. Created by Fantastic Arcade 2014’s BARFCADE host Thu Tran and her Cleveland Games collaborator Ivan Safrin.

name: Bad Parenting
description: Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children. It's said that he often appears late at night to give gifts to well-behaved kids. But is the story of Mr. Red Face really that simple?

name: Clock Tower Deluxe
description:
Clock Tower Deluxe is a hack of Clock Tower (1995) for the Super Famicom created by BobSchneeder45

List of changes and improvements:

—Features—
Mouse support
Lost bedroom, clown doll, zombie, extra cave event ported from the PlayStation version
Can run up and down the stairs (can also run to all hotspots)
Refined chase system (opt out by using the classic chase patch)
Hold UP or DOWN to speed up the credits
Faster health regeneration
Region error screen disabled

—Mouse—
Left button: walk/click things
Right button: stop/panic button
Press SELECT to change mouse speed (on real hardware). Changes cursor speed for the gamepad instead if no mouse connected.
Move the cursor down to access the inventory. Right clicking there will switch to the default cursor

name: Risky Bison
description: Risky Bison is a game about managing the financial affairs of a herd of buffalo, from the creator of Fantastic Arcade favorite Enviro Bear 2000 and Desert Golfing.

name: Fruiti Blox
description: A browser puzzle game.

name: 1986 Scary Mr. Chainsaw Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinium
description: Sin descripción

name: The Godfather
description: Sin descripción

name: HeShe
description: 2 players cooperative platform puzzle. Made after LD30, this is the post-compo version.

name: The House of Da Vinci VR
description: Experience the world of The House of Da Vinci like never before in this captivating VR puzzle adventure. Solve complex puzzles, uncover hidden items, and escape rooms, all embodying the Renaissance spirit. Use your intellect to discover what led to your master’s disappearance.

name: The Godfather: The Don's Edition
description:
Released on the same day in March 2007 as the Wii version, and developed alongside it, the PlayStation 3 version was the last version of the game announced, and was not revealed until January 10, 2007, with all the graphical and gameplay enhancements of both the Xbox 360 version and the Wii version (including the deeper upgrade system). In a statement, EA said the Don's Edition would "take full advantage" of the Sixaxis controller's motion sensor, and would also feature added gameplay in the form of "The Corleone Expansion Pack".

The Don's Edition features a more basic form of the gesture-based BlackHand control scheme seen in the Wii version. The game uses the SIXAXIS' motion sensor functionality in interrogations and, to a limited degree, during melee combat. As in the Wii, if the player wishes to lift someone from their knees, they simply pull the controller upwards. Swinging the controller from side to side swings the enemy likewise. Slamming someone against a wall is accomplished by pushing the controller away from the player. Unlike in the Wii version, however, where shooting and driving were handled using the Wii Remote, in The Don's Edition, shooting and driving are controlled using the analog sticks.

Unique to The Don's Edition are the "Corleone challenges". These are time based minigames that have no effect on the story. The player must see how much of a certain action they can accomplish in a given time - such as how many different execution styles they can perform, how many banks they can rob, or many businesses they can extort etc. When the game first came out, the player's scores were uploaded to an online leaderboard.

EA shut down their servers for the game on April 13, 2012, meaning players can no longer upload their scores. However, the mini-games are still playable.

name: Kimi sae Ireba
description: Hundreds of years later, humans and Heflites coexist on a hidden planet near Earth. Finding a mate is the goal, but will something like that really help her break free from the deep darkness she experienced as a child? "...This feeling...is not an obsession..."

name: Effing Hail
description: Dive into a weather diagram and lay waste to a city by wielding your power over hail!

name: El Camino Del Zorro
description: El Camino del Zorro or The Fox's Path in English is a platform game created for a school project. It's about our character, Foxy, who wants to return home. Along the way, he encounters some difficulties.

name: Toribash
description:
Put button-bashing opponents to the sword in a new WiiWare fighting game that lets you get creative as you battle to victory!

Toribash is an online fighting game where you’re free to make your own moves! Use precision motion control to create any move you want – the only limit is your imagination! Manipulate your fighter’s joints for maximum impact and take out your opponents with precise hits. Boost your joints for that added speed and strength to hit harder then grab your opponents and slam them to the ground.

Want to make your own fight movies? Just jump into the replay editor. You can enter replays at any point in time and review your fight to catch that mind-blowing move you missed. And when you are done, share it with your buddies through WiiConnect24!

name: Apartment Story
description: A third-person thriller about three people and a gun in a single apartment. Navigate escalating real-time narrative events whilst managing Sims-esq stats to stay strong for an inevitable showdown. You play as Arthur, a young man trying to make it day to day before a gun turns his life upside down.

name: Single Player Tarkov
description: SPT is a mod that allows you to play Escape from Tarkov offline and customize your game settings.

name: Daisy's Crazy Adventure
description:
Daisy's Crazy Adventure is a choco-nilla hack with standard - normal difficulty.

The hack is loosely inspired by Super Mario Land.

name: Super Mario Land World
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokemon RE:Call
description: After becoming a Pokémon Trainer, you come back to Knot Island to reconnect with an old friend, Bill. As the good friend you are, you decide to help Bill with his mission, encountering many problems with the evil Team Rocket. Their boss, Giovanni, has hidden agendas with Pokémon, especially the unique Paradox Pokémon, which have energy from the past and future.

name: Pokemon Tactics
description:
From a region where Pokémon are feared, you accompany Professor Ceibo, a researcher isolated from society. To the region of Xicadia, a place where humans and Pokémon live in peace, fighting hand in hand... and with each other.
The objective: To investigate on an evolutionary method, which manifests itself with the bonds of humans and Pokémon, an evolutionary method for humans.
For that Professor Ceibo together with 3.... well 4 mercenaries to help you. Brigham, a bard with a face of few friends accompanied by his Chimchar, Lily's older brother. Lily, a girl who supports her cowardly Chikorita from a distance. Murchadh, a berserker with a good heart but who doesn't talk much about his past, accompanied by a friendly Mudkip. Finally Valentina, a thunder mage accompanied by a rather lazy Shinx.

name: Pokémon Consonancia
description: Pokémon Consonance, inspired by Pokémon Masters, is a game in which you will travel to Passio as a novice trainer, there you will meet different characters from all the official releases together, from Kanto to Paldea, as well as characters brought by the Masters, such as Professor Margarita, You will participate in the WPM, a high level tournament that seeks to determine the strongest trainer of all, to achieve this task, you must improve as a trainer, but also, you must recruit different characters for your team, some of them will do it by history but many of them will depend on a RNG factor: The gachapon mode. It won't be easy to be the best, so testing strategies and team combinations will be fundamental!

name: Pokémon Abismal
description:
A thousand years ago, a meteorite hit the Kingdom of Celestia. From its interior, an evil being emerged that tried to plunge the world into darkness, but after a bloody war, that being was banished to another dimension... Until now, because it is said that the seal that held him captive has been destroyed.

Live a unique adventure to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Kingdom of Celestia. A radical climate change, the appearance of the mysterious Astral Pokémon and the existence of a sect that worships the Dark Star are just some of the many threats to the peace of the kingdom.

Will you be able to save Celestia from its end or will you be a mere witness to its destruction?

name: Pokémon Sombras de Arceus
description:
Pokémon Shadows of Arceus is a deconstruction of the traditional Pokémon story, giving it a more strategic touch and offering a real challenge for Pokémon lovers.

The story focuses on exploration, getting all the necessary resources to continue the adventure and is open, you can do it in the order you want.

There will be training facilities to be able to create different combat strategies.

Create your ultimate multicolored team thanks to the random shiny wells!

The story originates in the region of Heria, where a group of scientists manage to develop a whole industry around Pokémon battles.
Their mission is to train Pokémon for competition and sell them to trainers to gain popularity in battles and funding for their projects.
They use the same cloning method they used with Mewtwo. Thanks to him, they started to awaken and capture legendaries to make Pokémon battling a much bigger spectacle.
But something terrible happened when they awakened Arceus and the world as we know it was almost destroyed to ashes.

The story is set 10 years after this event and shows us a post-apocalyptic world, plagued by very strong wild Pokémon and evildoers lurking around every corner.
After suffering an attack, our protagonist receives his first Pokémon and once he overcomes the first challenge of getting his first medal, the destiny that has been waiting for him for so long, finally appears.

name: 6 Great Games: Windows XP Edition
description:
Compilation of 6 games consisting of:

- Creatures 3
- Microsoft Golf 1998 Edition
- Missile Command
- New Vegas Games
- Platinum Pinball
- Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft

name: Pokémon Berilo
description:
In your region, there's no training for Pokémon trainers, and thanks to Professor Rosa, an acquaintance of your parents, you get a ticket to Nubia. There you get your first Pokémon and can challenge the eight Leaders of the region to challenge the Champion. In your path will cross a completely untraditional Villain Team, what will they want? What will be their role in your adventure? They are up to something and you can be sure it won't be good.

Traversing Nubia will be no easy task, full of story elements, quests, ruins, hidden treasures and colorful NPCs that will help you in your adventure (or not). If you are a person who enjoys exploring everything and looking for the hidden secrets of the game, you will find that the game is not easy.

name: Picture Perfect
description: Find the perfect shot in this cozy puzzle game about forced perspective.

name: Pokémon Pro
description:
Developed with Pokémon PSDK for RPG Maker XP, you will enter a new region called Zealon. With your pokémon team and your friends, you will face challenges in which your skills as a trainer will be tested. Get ready for an adventure where the darkness can catch you. But remember: Stars only shine when the sky is dark.

In the past, the Zealon region was inhabited by humans. The pokémon were predominant throughout the region, until one day it was discovered by humans. This caused a great conflict in being conquered by the great powers of that time, causing great wars for the territories of the region.

Not all humans had the same greed to obtain the territory of others. One trainer wanted harmony in the region.
This same trainer created an alliance of a few trainers to help end the wars that the region was suffering, after seeing that the great powers did not want to reach a pact. But even so, the alliance was not enough to stop the wars.

Pharaoh, legendary Pokémon and considered sovereign of life. He had been observing the wars caused by greed for decades. He came to the conclusion that these wars were caused by the conflicts of the humans themselves.
The balance of life among the pokémon was breaking down and Pharaoh ordered Kenaice and Spiwolf, pokémon guardians of the balance between life and death, to stop these wars.

Kenaice and Spiwolf appeared in the battle. Thanks to their power they were able to put an end to the wars, and helped those trainers and pokémon who wanted harmony by giving them some of their energy to recover.

That trainer and his companions, managed that several cultures lived in harmony for many years and thanks to those legendary pokémon the balance between life and death was restored.

Nowadays, during your adventure in exploring the region and overcoming the challenges that await you, you will be involved in the chaotic history that can happen again in the Zealon region.

name: Pokémon Panteón
description: In an ancient region called Olympia, our protagonist embarks on an incredible odyssey proposed by the philosopher professor Palmiro. Defeat the leaders of the different Agoras of the region and solve their mysteries. Confront the students of the Platena Academy and meet your eternal rivals, Lira and Aulus.

name: Pokémon Z
description: Discover what happened in the Kalos region 300 years ago.

name: Brigand: Nightmare
description:
BRIGAND - NIGHTMARE revamps the original story of BRIGAND - OAXACA, adding in more difficulty and new features from the BRIGAND - PANAMA DLC such as woodcraft, traps, and voodoo-casting baddies, as well as a new optional map accessible from Chapter 6 on.

It's a lot harder than the original, meant for hardcore fans. Hunger increases 50% faster, and baddie AI now picks up items. There is also a partial Spanish translation included called NIGHTMARE (ES).

name: Tiny Technologies
description:
Think with scaling! Resize object and yourself in order to navigate through 8 puzzle levels.
The game was inspired by Portal and Talos Principle and created as part of the GMTK 2024 game jam

name: Pokémon Conquerors
description: The Ransei Region is divided into kingdoms for each elemental type, and these are at constant war. Nobunaga the Warlord of the dragon kingdom of the North has the ambition to conquer all Ransei to destroy it, and you, the protagonist Warlord of Aurora must find a way to stop him by forming your army.

name: Pokémon Hero
description:
Original Story: Forget about gym leaders and embark on a whole new adventure.
Unique cast: Meet colorful characters with varied personalities and ideals.
Heroism: Each character will see you as a hero or villain in their story depending on your actions.
Pokémon of all generations available.
Challenge to your measure: 3 levels of difficulty and the enemies adapt to the level of your Pokémon.
Bosses both obligatory and optional.
Scripted Battles: Adding strategy and narrative to the encounters.
Hidden Zones: Discover Zorua's illusions, revealing treasures and mysteries.
Missions and Achievements.
Extensive and detailed map that you will be able to travel with Ultraflight.
Battle interface that allows you to see all the information in combat.
Challenges and Riddles that will test your strength and intelligence.
Many more mechanics such as Pokémon following you, see the Pokémon available on each route, Mugshots, etc..

name: Pokémon Evol
description: Choose your partner and begin your Pokémon adventure in the Dalaris region. Crime has increased and someone close to you has been splashed. Does this mean that an old Team Villain is about to return?

name: Pokémon Existence
description:
Original Pokémon (only a few families) ranging from Gen 1 to Gen 9. (For now, there is access to 40 families within the fangame).
In total, the game features over 200 Pokémon species, most of them being original to the game, native species.
It features the Mega Evolution mechanics, although the concept has been readapted and is based on the “Divinization” of the species, which are orbs that react to the Vital Particle.
Creation of many new moves with very diverse effects, in addition to a large number of moves per tutor, which gives more variety of attacks to the game.
Within the Gyms, there will be 1 employee who will be able to teach useful moves to the protagonist, beyond those already found as normal with the passage of the adventure.
It does not have mechanics such as Dynamax or Z-Moves, since it does not make much sense for the development of our story. However, apart from the forms by Divinization, there are also several form changes between species, fusions and use of armor (without the need for a final evolutionary phase).
There are several regional forms of existing Pokémon (examples would be Slugma and Sableye).
Improved the probability of finding shiny Pokémon.

name: Habromania
description: HABROMANIA is an offbeat, unsettlingly charming, narrative rich point-and-click game inspired by Alice in Wonderland. It follows 19-year-old, well-mannered Alice as she tumbles headfirst into Wonderland. With no memory of her past and no real allies except an enigmatic, grinning cat, Alice must outwit, outmatch, and maybe even befriend the mildly psychotic people and creatures she encounters as she tries to return to her world - with or without going mad herself.

name: MadBreak
description: Dive into MadBreak, a captivating reimagining of the beloved "Brick Breaker" game. With each level, you'll face exhilarating challenges that push your skills to the limit. Can you master the unique twists and turns that MadBreak throws your way? Break through the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary. Test your reflexes, strategize your moves, and discover if you have what it takes to conquer MadBreak! Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled journey where every block shattered brings you closer to victory. Are you up for the challenge? Game SUPPORTs controller use!

name: Frog Galaxy Survivor
description: Hi, it's Frogus! A nasty vortex has appeared in the sky and turned my frog friends and the Earth into puzzle pieces! Help me find them in these different space universes and platforms !

name: Wuthering Waves: In the Turquoise Moonglow
description:
Version 1.2 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Zhezhi and Xiangli Yao
• New main event: By Moon's Grace
• New companion story for Zhezhi: True Colors
• New echoes, events and more!

name: The Midnight Bus
